summary: "Raya and the Last Dragon" is a 2021 Disney animated adventure film about a warrior princess named Raya. She goes on a quest to find the last dragon and save her father and their land from evil spirits. The film is set in a world inspired by Southeast Asian cultures and features a diverse cast of characters. It was directed by Don Hall and Carlos LÃ³pez Estrada, and stars Kelly Marie Tran and Awkwafina. The movie was released in theaters and on Disney+ during the COVID-19 pandemic and received positive reviews.
title: Raya and the Last Dragon
